properties.body:
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
DNC 09.
M/V NORMAN ATLANTIC, 450 PERSONS ON BOARD, ON FIRE
IN 40-20N 018-59E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
